fields.description:
When a CI build runs, it generates reports from {{gulp check}} and {{gulp coverage}}, but these reports aren't stored anywhere. It would be great if these reports could be combined and uploaded, probably as an artifact.

The work for this would go in the {{gulp package}} task.
fields.summary: appcd: Extend CI process to create build report and upload somewhere
